channel.title: Posts on Jeff Benson's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Jeff Benson's Blog

item.title: How to Start a Blog, For Under 2$ A Month
item.description: So this is my blog. I wanted to create one, but I’m also a bit of a nerd, so I decided to do this in the most effecient way I could, which as is often the case, involves messing around with technologies that I’m familiar enough with, but need some serious hands-on time.
